faqMenQuestion: Are men and other genders allowed to go to the event?
faqMenAnswer: Yes! We encourage them to come. Our event is inclusive and open to all genders!
faqAgeQuestion: Are there ID requirements or a minimum age limit to enter this event?
faqTransportQuestion: What are my transportation/parking options for getting to and from the event?
faqTransportAnswer: The venue is near the Bonaventure metro station. Besides the parking meters around the area, there is also a parking garage available at the venue for 16$/day.
faqQuestion: If I have any questions, how can I contact the organizers?
faqAnswer: You can contact us at info@wtmmontreal.com :)
faqRefundAnswer: We can refund your ticket until March 13th, 2020, but you will lose the fees paid to Eventbrite. The ticket can also be transferred to someone else by contacting info@wtmmontreal.com .
homeDescription: Women Techmakers is a program created by Google to celebrate International Women's Day and to highlight the talent of women in technology. This program has been in over 200 global events and seen across 52 countries.
title: Women Techmakers Montreal
